Class RailsIndex

public class RailsIndex
extends java.lang.Object

Contains and manages the list of rails whose update should be prevented.

putUpdatePrevention

public static void putUpdatePrevention(com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block.CreeperRail block)
Add the location to the list of blocks that shouldn't be updated. The block's updates are prevented until after 200 times the block per block replacement interval.

Parameters:
block - The block.
